thread.title: Create Test Data with Updated dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server
thread.title_full: Create Test Data with Updated dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server

title: Create Test Data with Updated dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server
text: Create Test Data with Updated dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server Czech Republic, 21 September 2015 -- Devart updates data generation tool dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server with Iron Python generator.Devart released a new version of dbForge Data Generator for SQL. Version 3.6 includes the following new features: - Iron Python generator implemented - Credit Card Type generator redesigned - International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) generator improved - IPv4 Address generator extended - 5 new meaningful generators added dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server is a powerful GUI tool for a fast generation of large volumes of SQL Server test table data. The tool supports all column data types and allows to define tables and columns for data generation, set value ranges, customize parameters for each column data type, preview data before generation, edit and save data generation scripts for the future use. Learn more about new version of dbForge Data Generator for SQL Server at https://www.devart.com/news/2015/dbforgesqldatagenerator35.html # # # About Devart: About Devart Devart is a recognized vendor of database connectivity solutions for Microsoft .NET and Embarcadero Delphi development platforms as well as database development and management software. Company's solutions support such databases as Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, InterBase, Firebird, DB2, SQLite, etc. Along with database-oriented software, Devart offers productivity tools for Visual Studio and Skyvia, the cloud service for data integration, management and backup.
